products.name: Sock
products.description: Shop fun crew socks and ankle socks from your favorite brands at Zumiez

products.name: Nixon Sentry 42 Leather Bronze
products.description: The Sentry Leather watch in bronze and gunmetal from Nixon raises the bar with its classic inspired styling and bold lines. This timepiece is featured in a gunmetal 42mm case finished with bronze accents and a wide brown genuine leather band. The face of this watch is in a white colorway with black faceted applied hour indices and printed seconds track. Along with a date and day window at the 3 o'clock hour marker and custom molded hands, this watch is perfect for the stylish person indeed

products.name: Polaroid Originals OneStep 2 Viewfinder White Instant Camera
products.description: Inspired by the original OneStep camera from 1977, the OneStep 2 Viewfinder White Instant Camera from Polaroid Originals is here to capture your greatest moments. With only a few buttons, the OnStep 2 VF features an easy-to-use interface that works straight out of the box. With a high quality lens and powerful flash, this instant camera will give you great photos every time. The OneStep 2 Viewfinder is compatible with i-Type or 600 film to create your unique images. The improved viewfinder makes framing your photos super intuitive, plus it's long-lasting rechargeable battery will have you ready to shoot at the drop of a dim

products.name: Spy Cyrus Matte Black Happy Bronze
products.description: Get a comfortable fit thanks to a rubberized matte black frame with bronze and blue Spectra 6-base polycarbonate ARC Happy Lenses for amazing color enhancement and glare reductio
